de.slothsoft.charts

Interface ChartPart

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Drawable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Border

    public interface ChartPart
extends Drawable
    This class represents a part of the Chart that is not used for the actual graph. Classes are connected like this:

    Common ChartParts are:
    • Border
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void paintOn(GraphicContext gc, PaintInstructions instructions)
      Paints the current content onto the graphic context.
      Area snipNecessarySpace(Area existingArea)
      This method removes space from the existing area to make room for this part.

    • Method Detail

      • paintOn

        void paintOn(GraphicContext gc,
             PaintInstructions instructions)
        Paints the current content onto the graphic context. Checks the instructions for what to paint. Coordinates are starting from the top left with 0|0 and ending bottom right with something like 800|600.
        Specified by:
        paintOn in interface Drawable
        Parameters:
        gc - - graphic context; coordinates are relative to the Chart
        instructions - - additional instructions like the area to paint on

      • snipNecessarySpace

        Area snipNecessarySpace(Area existingArea)
        This method removes space from the existing area to make room for this part. E.g. a part on the left of the graph would increase the x and decrease the width.
        Parameters:
        existingArea - - the area this part could use
        Returns:
        the area for the next parts
